item.title: Kube Tricks
item.description: Quickly scaffolding manifests: kubectl create deployment foo \ --image=nginx:1.21 \ --dry-run=client \ -o yaml K8s YAML generator with descriptions: https://k8syaml.com/ Debugging workflow: kubectl get Do I see the resources I expect? What are their states? kubectl describe What are the events? Does the describe line up with your manifest? kubectl logs Are there errors in the logs? Are your requests making it to the application?
